meanings.definition: To receive a medal as a prize or honor.
meanings.sent1: She was medaling in the race for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was medaling at the sports event.
meanings.sent3: After medaling in the competition, she proudly displayed her award.
meanings.sent4: His hard work and dedication paid off, medaling in the championship.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of medaling was overwhelming and unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To award a medal to someone.
meanings.sent1: The coach was medaling the winners of the tournament.
meanings.sent2: They were medaling the top performers at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mayor enjoyed medaling the outstanding citizens of the town.
meanings.sent4: The teacher was medaling the students for their academic achievements.
meanings.sent5: The organization takes pride in medaling individuals who contribute to the community.
